DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational , single-arm , nonrandomized , multicenter study . Data collect establish eligibility , baseline , stimulation vitro fertilization process , embryo culture , embryo transfer , 12-18 day post egg retrieval verify biochemical pregnancy , typically 5-6 week gestational week verify clinical pregnancy .
